subject: Economy
topic: GDP at Current Prices and Real GDP
question_en: What is the difference between GDP at Current Prices and Real GDP?
question_hi: वर्षीय GDP (वर्षीय ग्राहक दर वर्षीय स्रोत टेक्सटियट द्वारा समझने के लिए कैसे सेवाएं प्रदान कीजिए।
A_en: GDP at Current Prices is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a specific time period at their market prices.
A_hi: वर्षीय ग्राहक दर वर्षीय स्रोत टेक्सटियट
B_en: Real GDP represents the value of goods and services produced in a country after adjusting for inflation and other economic factors.
C_en: The formula to calculate GDP at Current Prices is: GDP at Current Prices = Total Value x (1 + Inflation Rate).
D_en: Real GDP is a more accurate measure of a country's economic performance as it takes into account changes in the prices of goods and services produced.
question_en: How is GDP at Current Prices different from Real GDP?
question_fr: Le revenu national brut (RNB) est différent de le revenu national brut approuvé (RNB)?
question_zh: 国内生产者总值(国内生产总值)和国内生产总值的对于特定时间段(对特定时间段的国内生产总值)
question_ja: 経済的国際核審核審(現金外国際核審核審)
question_zh-Hans: 国内生产总值(国内生产总值)
question_ms: Negara ke ekonomi negara ke ekonomi
